Gordon is a principal at SEP, focusing on telecoms technology and software.

Gordon manages SEPâ€™s investments in: Chronicle Solutions, a developer of information security software; Zeus Technology, a software company developing solutions for optimising web-based traffic; and Essential Viewing Systems, a video compression technology company.
